message.raw:
Refactoring done. Working but ugly hdf5 write code for Alazartech,
which works if sampling ChA, or ChA+ChB, but not if sampling only ChB. This is a bit nasty.
Fixing takes a bigger-picture refactor but would be useful for more channels...
